Detailed Description

Base class for output records, containing mainly virtual methods. It has default destructor, copy constructor, assignment because there are no pointers.

unsigned  pad,
unsigned long  recNum,
const timespec  tick

Fill the record with suitable artificial values

Parameters:
nowStr C-string containing the current time in ISO format
pad amount to pad some fields by (in range 0-99)

tick the current time in internal form

bool  enabled
)  [virtual]
 

Set enabled/disabled for a key, identified by ID.

Parameters:
ID The key ID.
enabled The new value for the key's being enabled
Returns:
true if the value was changed; false if no change or the key ID wasn't found.
